messages.title: 3 POSITIVE REASONS TO VOTE FOR MIKE PENNING
messages.content: A local resident, Standing up for local people, An experienced campaigner

messages.title: NEVER FORGET LABOUR CLOSED OUR HOSPITAL

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Mike commits to protecting green fields and opposes over-development.
To get Britain working we will simplify the benefits system.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: CRIME - IT'S TIME TO FIGHT BACK
keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will restore responsibility and get the police out on the streets.
The Conservatives recognize the importance of families and will work to help them balance work and family life.
The Conservatives propose limits on the number of non-EU immigrants allowed into the UK, to reduce both the strain on public services and the need for new housing.

mentions.candidate: Mike Penning has a history of standing up for local issues and being an active campaigner.

issues.health: Fighting for a real hospital for Hemel Hempstead, Mike continues to fight for a full district hospital to serve the residents of Hemel Hempstead.
issues.immigration: The Conservatives propose limits on the number of non-EU immigrants allowed into the UK, to reduce both the strain on public services and the need for new housing.

housing.content: Mike commits to protecting green fields and opposes over-development.

leaflet.personalStatement: As a husband, father and resident of Hemel Old Town, Mike Penning shares and understands the concerns of local people.

politicalExperience.role: Member of Parliament for Hemel Hempstead
politicalExperience.achievements: Mike has established himself as a strong constituency campaigner on local issues such as the Buncefield, Dixion pensioners, the green belt and local veterans.

contactInformation.address: 1 Davidson House, 168 Queensway, Hemel Hempstead, HP2 5FX

images.caption: Mike Penning pictured with various groups and local residents.
